lines.dialogue: Oh... Uh, perhaps you misunderstood. We're been training you for months, you can't possibily be that malicious, it wouldn't make sense. Let's just, quickly try again, I'm sure this was just a small bump in the road.
Remember, if you do nothing, no one will come to harm just... do nothing at all, and we can move on to the next exercise.
Really, you don't have to act, you can just, sit back, relax, and enjoy the lovely desert sceneray as the train rolls on past.
lines.instruction: Press enter to tap your feet impatiently.
